Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Match match)
      Constructs a new player instance.
      Parameters:
      match - the match the player belongs to

    • Player

      public Player(Match match, PlayableCard[] hand, PlayerField playerField, Objective objective, PlayerColor playerColor)
      Constructs a new player instance with all initial parameters.
      Parameters:
      match - The match the player belongs to.
      hand - The initial hand of cards for the player.
      playerField - The initial player field configuration.
      objective - The initial personal objective for the player.
      playerColor - The color associated with the player.

  • Method Details

    • chooseStarterCardSide

      public void chooseStarterCardSide(boolean side) throws PlayerExceptions
      Chooses the side of the starter card for this player.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the starter card to choose.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the appropriate time to choose the starter card or if the starter card side has already been chosen.

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(int num) throws PlayerExceptions
      Chooses the personal objective for this player.
      Parameters:
      num - The number corresponding to the personal objective to choose.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the appropriate time to choose the personal objective or the personal objective has already been chosen.

    • getPlayedCards

      public List<CardPlacement> getPlayedCards()
      Retrieves the list of cards played by the player.
      Returns:
      A list of CardPlacement objects representing the cards played by the player.

    • getHand

      public PlayableCard[] getHand()
      Retrieves the hand of cards held by the player.
      Returns:
      An array of PlayableCard objects representing the player's hand.

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(StarterCard card, boolean side)
      Places the starter card on the player's field.
      Parameters:
      card - The starter card to place.
      side - The side of the starter card to place.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int index, Position position, boolean isFront) throws PlayerExceptions
      Plays a card from the player's hand at the specified index to the given position on the field.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to be played from the player's hand.
      position - The position on the field where the card will be played.
      isFront - Specifies whether the card will be placed with its front side up or down. true for placing the card with the front side up, false for placing it with the back side up.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If the specified index is not valid for the player's hand or if it's not the player's turn to play a card or if a card has already been played during this turn or if the requirements for playing the card are not fulfilled or if the specified position is not valid for card placement.

    • drawMarket

      public void drawMarket(int index) throws PlayerExceptions
      Draws a card from the market at the specified index and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to draw from the market.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the player's turn to draw or if the player tries to draw before playing a card or if the provided index is invalid for the market.

    • drawGold

      public void drawGold() throws PlayerExceptions
      Draws a gold card from the game's resources and adds it to the player's hand.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the player's turn to draw or if the player tries to draw before playing a card or if there is no gold card available to draw.

    • drawResource

      public void drawResource() throws PlayerExceptions
      Draws a resource card from the game's resources and adds it to the player's hand.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the player's turn to draw or if the player tries to draw before playing a card or if there are no resource cards available to draw.

    • setHand

      public void setHand(PlayableCard[] playerHand)
      Sets the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playerHand - the array of playable cards to set as the player's hand

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(PlayerColor color)
      Sets the color of the player.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to set for the player.

    • setObjective

      public void setObjective(Objective obj)
      Sets the player's personal objective.
      Parameters:
      obj - The personal objective to set for the player.
